titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, encloses the first of exchange (not included) for 687 rupees on the Military Paymaster, in favour of the Government. Bruce states that the amount has been advanced to Lieutenant William MacDonald, for expenses incurred by the HC dow [dhow] Nimrod,which has been employed on account of the garrison at Rasselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah].
